nodes.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React

nodes.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.

nodes.title: Nacapi - Turn your JSON into a restful API

nodes.excerpt: We are glad to introduce Colorgram - an extension that replaces a white Instagram theme with a new colored one! Just choose a new theme from a list of different themes, apply it, and your Instagram will be painted to new cool colors.
nodes.title: Colorgram - Dark mode for Instagram
nodes.author: John Tolley

nodes.excerpt: With Multistream Studio you can simultaneously broadcast to multiple live video services while using your favourite app (like OBS or Zoom), video camera, hardware encoder or mobile phone. It acts like a middleman copying your stream to multiple destinations.
nodes.title: Multistream Studio - Broadcast to multiple video services from any software

nodes.excerpt: Send every customer a personalized onboarding checklist, with automated email reminders, assigned tasks, and a lot more. Upgrade that dusty spreadsheet and onboarding process you no longer love. Onboard your next customer with Arrows.
nodes.title: Arrows - Collaborative onboarding for high-touch customers

nodes.excerpt: Upskill in data science by working on projects co-created with tech companies. Remote learning at your pace, supervised by industry experts. Build a portfolio and be work-ready on day one! Pay when employed with an Income Share Agreement (ISA).
nodes.title: Turing College - Data science career school co-created with tech companies
